title: 31 Days of Summer
description: The truth, the whole truth, and nothing but the truth...That is all I want, all I need. After everything we went through, everything we shared, he owes me that much.It's time to start over, start dating, and move on. But when I do, it's a constant reminder, of him, of us, of everything we lost.So now, I am going to go back, to get the truth, the answers, to everything.When I do, this time it’s me with a secret to hide.31 Days of Summer is the second book in the 31 Days erotic romance trilogy, which must be read sequence to avoid spoilers. The series contains adult themes ~ Suitable for the over 18’s only.The 31 Days Trilogy Box Set is also available, at a saving of over 25% compared to buying the three individual eBooks.
author: C.J. Fallowfield
